landing.mainHeading: Grow Your Farm, Grow Your Knowledge.
landing.description: This platform empowers farmers with essential knowledge and innovative tools. Gain valuable insights, and achieve better harvests. Whether you seek modern techniques, market trends, or solutions to common farming challenges, we're here to help you cultivate success and grow.

user.uploadImageDescription: Upload an image of a plant to get identification and agricultural guidance
user.identificationError: An error occurred while identifying the plant
user.mightNotBePlant: This image might not contain a plant. Results may be inaccurate.
user.identificationFailedMessage: Unable to identify the plant. Please try with a clearer, well-lit image showing the plant clearly.
user.agroConnectDescription: AgroConnect Nepal is a smart web/mobile platform empowering Nepali farmers. We provide personalized agricultural support, relevant information, and tools to help you improve practices, increase yields, and navigate farming challenges.
user.howCanHelp: How can AgroConnect Nepal help me?
user.helpDescription: We offer tailored information and tools:
user.personalizedUpdates: Personalized Updates: After providing your farm details, receive weekly, personalized tips based on your farm type, location, and crops. This includes crop-specific advice, pest/disease alerts, weather forecasts, and government resource availability, all in Nepali.
user.futureAI: Future AI Integration: Our roadmap includes an AI Assistant (voice-based Nepali chatbot), an Image Recognition Tool for crop disease identification, and Yield Prediction & Smart Planning using your farm data.
user.howToStart: How do I get started and use the platform effectively?
user.messageTab: Message Tab: Check the "Messages" tab for your weekly personalized agricultural tips and updates.
user.askQuestions: Ask Questions: Use the question feature to ask specific queries; our AI/ML will provide personalized answers.
user.imageQueryFuture: Image Query (Future): Soon, you'll be able to upload images of diseased crops for AI-powered identification and remedies.
user.utilizeFeatures: Utilize new features as they become available.
user.provideFeedback: Provide Feedback: Your input helps us improve and grow!
user.engageDescription: By engaging, you maximize the benefits of AgroConnect Nepal's personalized support.
user.feedbackDescription: We value your input! Please feel free to give feedback to us at
user.welcomeNewFarming: Welcome to AgroConnect! I am AgroBOT, here to guide you as you begin your farming journey. Ask me anything to get started!
user.welcomeEstablishedFarm: Welcome back to AgroConnect! I am AgroBOT. Let me know what you need help with to grow your established farm.
user.welcomeLookingForIdeas: Hi! I am AgroBOT. I can help you discover new ideas, trends, and innovations in agriculture. What would you like to explore today?
user.welcomeDefault: Hello! I am AgroBOT. How can I assist you today?
user.userNotFound: User not found. Please log in again.
